name: Fly Wheel
description:
WELCOME TO FLY WHEEL


Welcome to the adrenaline-pumping world of Fly Wheel, where sparks fly in a spectacular display of robotics mayhem! Fly Wheel is a thrilling combat sports game that pits competitors against each other in an excitement arena, get ready to enter the arena of fierce combat, where robots of all shapes and sizes clash in an electrifying battle for supremacy.

ARENA BATTLES


Fighting in a dynamic and visually stunning arena surrounded by obstacles such as fires and saws that can hinder the competitors during the match. Enjoy 4 arenas with variation of the environments, and with the fans excited to see the match full of excitement.

PLAY ALONE / TEAM UP


Warm up by playing solo against AI robots or gather your friends, and embark on an epic Split-Screen adventure. The arena is alive with fierce rivalry. Whichever you choose, have fun!

COMPETITORS


Encounter a diverse cast of robots with variation of weapons such as spinner, hammer, flipper and more, each with their own playstyles. Personalize your robots with dozens of camo and charms.
